title: The Pixel 6a will use a different in-display fingerprint scanner to the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro
content:
With some Pixel 6 owners still facing issues, it seems that the Pixel 6a will use a different in-display fingerprint scanner for biometric security.

moreâ€¦

The post The Pixel 6a will use a different in-display fingerprint scanner to the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is set to ditch the in-display fingerprint scanner used on the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro and instead use a different option on the Pixel 6a.
